list_definition.definition: (plural radiuses) the area within a given distance from a central point

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They searched within a radius of one mile from the school.

list_definition.definition: (plural radii-diai) mathematics a straight line from the centre/center of a circle to its circumference

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Measure the radius of the circle.
